title: New: Young Montana? – (ina)whurl(d)
content:
After several months of having to endure the torment of only one ipod earphone working, it’s rather fitting that on the day I splash out on a snazzy pair of Sennheiser’s, both Gold Panda and Young Montana? drop new tracks.

Two of the finest producers when it comes to visualizing intricate, vivid soundscapes, as Gold Panda’s Trust showed earlier and Young Montana?’s new joint (ina)whurl(d) is yet another reminder of just how talented the Birmingham based musician is. Funky synth lines and progressive percussion sections intertwine gloriously, creating a track that’s entertaining and thoroughly engrossing. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
